Class CalculatorParser1

java.lang.Object
org.parboiled.parser.BaseActions<V>
org.parboiled.parser.BaseParser<V>
org.parboiled.examples.calculators.CalculatorParser<Integer>
org.parboiled.examples.calculators.CalculatorParser1
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.parboiled.ContextAware<Integer>
public class CalculatorParser1 extends CalculatorParser<Integer>
A calculator parser building calculation results directly in the parsers value stack. All calculations are implemented directly in action expressions.
